name: Light - 2022 Game Jam
description:
This is a short hyper-casual game created as Henry Northway's entry of the University of Gloucestershire's 2022 Game Jam.

In this challenge, we were given two days to create a game from scratch under the theme of "light". As a two-day challenge, I figured a simple high-score system would be best, and went with the idea of using your mouse (or finger for tablets) to draw a beam of light and cut through glowing spheres.

Controls

  • Left Click - Draw a beam of light
  • ESC - Toggle Pause
